description: Try our easy to follow Chorizo Penne Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chorizo Penne Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 10ml extra virgin olive oil (extra, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan of boiling water, add 1 tbs salt and penne pasta. Cook following packet directions or until the penne is al dente. Drain, reserving 1/4 cup (60ml) of the cooking liquid.
Meanwhile, in a frying pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chorizo and cook, stirring, until the chorizo is golden and cooked through.

Add onion, garlic and cherry tomatoes to the pan and cook for 2 mins. Carefully add the stock and cook for 2 mins or until the liquid is almost evaporated. Add the diced tomato. Simmer for 3-4 mins, adding the reserved cooking liquid to loosen the sauce. Add penne and stir for 2 mins or until heated through. Add the basil, if using, and stir to combine. Remove from heat.
Divide pasta among serving bowls. Sprinkle with grated parmesan and garnish with basil. Drizzle with extra oil.
